title: "Cyborg Digital Art"
content: Welcome to our website, where we showcase digital art inspired by the future and technology. Our minimalist wallpaper of a cyborg's face against a backdrop of digital noise and static perfectly captures the essence of our site. We believe that the merging of man and machine is inevitable, and our artwork reflects this belief. Browse through our collection of futuristic images and immerse yourself in a world where technology and humanity coexist.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A wallpaper with a simple graphic of a cyborg's face, against a background of digital noise and static."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
